description: Retrieves information about the configurable settings for the specified directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the directory for which to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: SettingEntries
nested_items.description: The list of  SettingEntry objects that were retrieved.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type, or category, of a directory setting. Similar settings have the same type. For example, Protocol, Cipher, or Certificate-Based Authentication.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the directory setting. For example:

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The valid range of values for the directory setting. These values depend on the DataType of your directory.

nested_items.name: AppliedValue
nested_items.description: The value of the directory setting that is applied to the directory.

nested_items.name: RequestedValue
nested_items.description: The value that was last requested for the directory setting.

nested_items.name: RequestStatus
nested_items.description: The overall status of the request to update the directory setting request. If the directory setting is deployed in more than one region, and the request fails in any region, the overall status is Failed.

nested_items.name: RequestDetailedStatus
nested_items.description: Details about the status of the request to update the directory setting. If the directory setting is deployed in more than one region, status is returned for the request in each region where the setting is deployed.

nested_items.name: RequestStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The last status message for the directory status request.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the directory setting was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastRequestedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the request to update a directory setting was last submitted.

nested_items.name: DataType
nested_items.description: The data type of a directory setting. This is used to define the AllowedValues of a setting. For example a data type can be Boolean, DurationInSeconds, or Enum.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, token that indicates that more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent call to DescribeSettings to retrieve the next set of items.
